definition: A set of guidelines or regulations that determine the allocation and organization of time dedicated to work-related activities, typically used in the context of employment or labor laws.

examples.english: The working time regulation allows for flexible working hours.

examples.german: Die Arbeitszeitregelung gilt für alle Mitarbeiter.
examples.english: The working time regulation applies to all employees.

examples.german: Die Arbeitszeitregelung legt die tägliche Arbeitszeit fest.
examples.english: The working time regulation determines the daily working hours.
The working time regulation also regulates break times.

examples.german: Die Arbeitszeitregelung ist in unserem Tarifvertrag festgelegt.
examples.english: The working time regulation is defined in our collective agreement.
